scripts.build:docker-staging: turbo run build && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64,linux/arm/v7  -f Dockerfile.staging -t mtbossa/raspberry-prod:staging --push .
scripts.build:docker-prod: turbo run build && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64,linux/arm/v7  -f Dockerfile.production -t mtbossa/raspberry-prod:latest --push .
scripts.build:docker-local: turbo run build && docker build -f Dockerfile.staging -t mtbossa/raspberry-prod:staging .
